    • Method Detail

      • addProfile

        int addProfile​(Profile profile)
        Adds a profile to the database
        Parameters:
        profile - a Profile object
        Returns:
        the ID of the added profile

      • findById

        ProfileData findById​(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of a profile
        Returns:
        the found entity instance or null if the entity does not exist

      • findByIds

        List<ProfileData> findByIds​(Collection<Integer> identifiers)
        Retrieves a list of ProfileData objects
        Parameters:
        identifiers - a list of identifiers
        Returns:
        the list of objects specified. Returns an empty list if none where found.

      • changeProfile

        void changeProfile​(Profile profile)
        Updates profile data
        Parameters:
        profile - the updated profile

      • removeProfile

        void removeProfile​(ProfileData profileData)
        Removes the given approval profile.
        Parameters:
        profileData - a profile data object

      • renameProfile

        void renameProfile​(Profile profile,
                   String newname)
            throws ProfileDoesNotExistException
        Renames an approval profile
        Parameters:
        profile - the profile to rename
        newname - the new name of the approval profile
        Throws:
        ProfileDoesNotExistException - if the profile given as a parameter does not exist

      • findAllProfiles

        List<ProfileData> findAllProfiles​(String profileType)
        Parameters:
        profileType - the profile type
        Returns:
        return all approval profiles as a List.

      • findByNameAndType

        List<ProfileData> findByNameAndType​(String name,
                                    String type)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the sought profile
        type - the type identifier of the sought profile
        Returns:
        the found entity instances or an empty list.
